what.question: What exactly is Eroica?
what.answer: Eroica is a civic participation platform designed for communities that believe in collective decision-making. It combines democratic voting, project funding, and transparent governance into one unified system. Whether you're a neighborhood association, nonprofit, cooperative, or any group making decisions together — Eroica provides the infrastructure for genuine democracy.

coins.question: How does the Eroica Coins economy work?
coins.answer: Eroica Coins are an internal currency that makes participation tangible. Vote on a proposal: earn 5 EC. Submit your own proposal: earn 25 EC. Invite a new member: earn 15 EC. Every new user starts with 100 EC. You can donate your coins to fund projects you believe in — creating a direct line between civic engagement and community impact.

privacy.question: How is our community data protected?
privacy.answer: You have complete control. Public communities are discoverable and open to all. Private communities exist only for invited members — invisible to search, accessible only by invitation. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We never sell your information. Your community's governance is yours alone.

migrate.question: Can we migrate from an existing platform?
migrate.answer: Absolutely. Our migration team has helped dozens of communities transition from legacy systems. We can transfer member rosters, historical decisions, project archives, and financial records. Contact us for a personalized migration consultation — we'll handle the technical complexity so you can focus on your community.

platforms.question: Where can we access Eroica?
platforms.answer: Eroica is available as a native mobile application for both iOS and Android. A full web platform for desktop access is in active development. All data synchronizes seamlessly across devices — participate wherever you are, however you prefer.

cancel.question: What if we need to cancel?
cancel.answer: Cancel anytime with no penalties. Your access continues through the end of your billing period, then you transition to the free tier with all core features intact. Your community data remains yours — export it whenever you wish. We believe in earning your continued trust, not locking you in.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Eroica Labs GmbH ("Eroica", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with Swiss data protection law (nDSG - Federal Act on Data Protection) and applicable international standards including GDPR. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is Eroica Labs GmbH, a Swiss company headquartered in Switzerland. We are subject to Swiss data protection laws and regulations.

dataCollected.title: Personal Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information automatically collected through your use of our services.
items: Account information: name, email address, password, profile picture
Community data: memberships, roles, voting history, proposals
Transaction data: Eroica Coins balance, donations, project contributions
Device information: device type, operating system, unique identifiers
Usage data: app interactions, features used, timestamps
Communications: support requests, feedback, survey responses

purpose.title: How We Use Your Data
purpose.content: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
items: Providing and maintaining our civic participation platform
Processing community votes, proposals, and governance activities
Managing the Eroica Coins economy and project funding
Sending notifications about community activities and updates
Improving our services through analytics and research
Ensuring platform security and preventing fraud
Complying with legal obligations under Swiss law

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: Under Swiss data protection law (nDSG), we process your data based on: (a) your consent where explicitly provided; (b) the necessity for the performance of our contract with you; (c) our legitimate interests in operating and improving our platform; (d) compliance with legal obligations. You may withdraw consent at any time without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We share your data only in the following circumstances:
items: With your community: votes, proposals, and profile information you choose to make visible
Service providers: hosting, analytics, and support services bound by confidentiality
Legal requirements: when required by Swiss law or valid legal process
Business transfers: in connection with merger, acquisition, or asset sale with prior notice

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your data is primarily stored on servers located in Switzerland. When transfers to countries outside Switzerland are necessary, we ensure adequate protection through Swiss-approved Standard Contractual Clauses or equivalent safeguards as required by Swiss data protection law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under Swiss data protection law (nDSG), you have the following rights:
items: Right to information: obtain details about what data we process
Right of access: request a copy of your personal data
Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Right to erasure: request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention requirements)
Right to data portability: receive your data in a structured format
Right to object: oppose processing based on legitimate interests
Right to lodge a complaint with the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, typically for the duration of your account plus 5 years for legal and tax compliance purposes under Swiss law. Voting records and community governance data may be retained longer for transparency and accountability.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, regular security audits, and employee training. Despite our efforts, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Material changes will be communicated through the app or via email at least 30 days before taking effect. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@eroica.io or write to: Eroica Labs GmbH, Data Protection Officer, Switzerland.

swissLaw.title: Swiss Law Compliance
swissLaw.content: This Privacy Policy is governed by Swiss law, specifically the Federal Act on Data Protection (nDSG) and its implementing ordinances. For users in the European Economic Area, we also comply with GDPR requirements. The competent supervisory authority is the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) in Switzerland.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Eroica AG uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our mobile application and website. We are committed to transparency about our data practices in accordance with Swiss data protection law (nDSG) and applicable international standards.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website or use an application. They serve various purposes, from remembering your preferences to analyzing how you use our services. Similar technologies include local storage, session storage, and device identifiers in mobile applications.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We categorize our cookies into three main types based on their purpose and necessity for the functioning of our platform.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are strictly necessary for the operation of our platform. They enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and session management. Without these cookies, the Services cannot function properly. No consent is required for essential cookies under Swiss law.
items: Authentication tokens to keep you logged in
Security tokens to prevent fraud and protect your account
Session identifiers for maintaining your current session
Language and locale preferences

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use analytics cookies to understand how users interact with our platform, which helps us improve our Services. These cookies collect aggregated, anonymous data about usage patterns. You can opt out of analytics cookies through your device or browser settings.
items: Page views and feature usage
Session duration and navigation patterns
Device type and operating system
Error reporting and performance metrics

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: These cookies remember your choices and settings to provide a personalized experience. They help us remember your display preferences, notification settings, and other customizations.

duration.title: Cookie Duration
duration.content: Session cookies are temporary and deleted when you close the app or browser. Persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period (typically up to 12 months) or until you delete them. We minimize cookie lifetimes consistent with their purposes.

control.title: Managing Cookies
control.content: You have control over cookies through several methods:
items: Device settings: manage app permissions and clear data
Browser settings: block or delete cookies (for web access)
In-app settings: toggle analytics and optional cookies
Opt-out links: specific tools for analytics providers

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services we use for analytics, crash reporting, and performance monitoring. These providers operate under their own privacy policies. We only work with providers that meet Swiss data protection standards.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Significant changes will be communicated through the app. The date at the top indicates the last revision.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about our use of cookies, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@eroica.io or write to: Eroica Labs GmbH, Switzerland.

swissLaw.title: Legal Framework
swissLaw.content: This Cookie Policy complies with Swiss data protection law (nDSG) and the Swiss Telecommunications Act (FMG) regarding electronic communications. For users in the EU/EEA, we also comply with the ePrivacy Directive. Essential cookies do not require consent; for other cookies, we provide clear opt-out mechanisms.
